A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I wanted to like this. I really did. But there was way too much going on in this movie that it halted the development of the Sequel Trilogy's plot. It didn't add to anything that was set up in TFA. It was almost as if TFA never happened. This movie was just really disjointed while not providing an explanation for anything that occurred. Like the Leia scene. WTF was that? It was just a bad movie. That was something I never\, in my wildest dreams\, thought I would be saying about The Last Jedi.
